textos_fuente.text: Contact Us | Reach Out Today — Scott Pools 0 Skip to Content Home What We Offer About Us Our Team Contact Us Open Menu Close Menu Home What We Offer About Us Our Team Contact Us Open Menu Close Menu Home What We Offer About Us Our Team Contact Us Contact us today. Interested in our pool services? Fill out the form below and we will be in touch shortly! Or feel free to call or text (317) 846-5576. We can't wait to hear from you! Name * First Name Last Name Email * Phone * (###) ### #### Address * Address 1 Address 2 City State/Province Zip/Postal Code Country What inground pool services are you interested in? (Check all that apply) Opening Closing Pool Cleaning Equipment Inquiry Other Service Work Store related questions (Maytronics robot repair, water testing questions, etc) Pool Size Cover Type Auto cover Tarp Extras? Waterfall, fountain, floor system, etc. Requested Time Frame: (Not guaranteed) Spa? Yes, above ground/portable Yes, in ground No spa Additional comments How did you hear about us? * Mail flyer Google/search engine Saw one of our service vehicles Recommendation from a friend Social Media Preferred Contact Method: * Phone call Text Email Thank you! We’ll be in touch soon. Scott Pools Inc. 7715 Loma Ct. Fishers, IN 46038 Hours: Monday-Friday 8AM-5PM Saturday 8AM-1PM Sunday Closed (317) 846-5576 info@scottpoolsinc.com Copyright Scott Pools. All rights reserved.

Tell us more about what you need * Required Field! start over Clear Form Submit Prices and amenities are in US Dollars and are subject to change without notice. HOME SERVICES BUILDING & PERMITTING ELECTIONS EMERGENCY / FEMA FINANCE PLANNING & ZONING HISTORY TOWN COUNCIL & BOARDS COUNCIL MEMBERS MINUTES & AGENDAS PUBLIC NOTICES TOWN CHARTER STAFF CONTACT US Select Page TOWN COUNCIL & BOARDS Members of the Ocean Breeze Town Council also server on the Zoning Board. Mayor Karen Ostrand Email Kevin Docherty President Council Member Email Sandy Kelley Vice President Council Member Email Janet Galante Council Member Email Matthew Squires Council Member Email George Ciaschi Council Member Email Michael Heller Council Member Email If you’d like to contact us, please complete the form below.  1508 NE Jensen Beach Blvd. Jensen Beach, FL 34957  Call Us: 772-334-6826 Office Hours: Mon – Thur 9:00 AM – 2:00 PM, closed on Fridays Notice: JavaScript is required for this content. Under Florida law, e-mail addresses are public records. If you do not want your e-mail address released in response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail to this entity. Instead, contact this office by phone or in writing. The Town of Ocean Breeze is committed to ensuring accessibility of its website to people with disabilities. To report an ADA accessibility issue, request accessibility assistance regarding our website content, or to request a specific electronic format, please contact the Town Clerk at  772-334-6826. We will make reasonable efforts to accommodate all needs.

Ocean Breeze Wellbeing & Consultancy E-learning login Home About me Menopause Consultancy Menopause workshop and presentation Testimonials Blog Contact Oceanbreeze e-learning Welcome to Ocean Breeze Wellbeing & Consultancy My consultation and coaching is focused on helping leaders to build strong and high performing teams with a health and well being culture at the centre of their Business. Lets talk! Testimonial NetworkRail "At Network Rail, we got in touch with Ali as we have a lot of managers who are male with female staff, we felt this would be a good opportunity to provide our male managers the chance to be able to support their female staff members when needed. At the beginning of the training our staff admitted they did not know much about the menopause, and were a little quite, after around 15 minutes all staff were engaging and were involved. By the end of the day all male staff members then felt they were equipped to help their female staff members when they start to go through the menopause process. The male staff went home and were speaking to their wives who they were also able to support as some were going through menopause. There was lots of positive talk for days after the training and we are also looking to get Ali back to deliver menopause training in other areas of the business." Group sessions Menopause workshops Raising awareness of why menopause is an important business issue and its effects on employees and their mental health. Understanding the risks of discrimination, case studies and workplace adjustments. Presentations, group sessions or 1:1 packages. Learn more! Let's talk! 1 to 1 Coaching Confidential leadership consultation Working 1:1 with business leaders in a confidential space where no work-related challenge or discussion is off the table.  Together we explore how you can improve your own performance, negotiate business challenges, and reach your potential. Learn more! Let's talk! My consultation and coaching is focused on helping leaders to build strong and high performing teams with a health and well being culture at the centre of their Business. I set up Ocean Breeze as I believe that leaders have responsibility to the people who work for them and that leadership development can bring about such positive outcomes to the people within an organisation. I have led successful teams and I have coached for most of my working life. I understand what it takes to create an engaged, healthy and high performing culture. Through this experience and with these insights I want to coach others to bring about changes that will have an impact on so many, build better more profitable businesses and make mental health and well being inclusion and conversation a normal part of working life. - Ali, Ocean Breeze Wellbeing Learn more about me → Testimonial Team Manager - Northants "As someone who struggles to see their strengths and talk positively about themselves, having a job interview for a promotion to Team Leader, in which I had to talk about myself and those strengths was terrifying. Ali helped to make it possible , she not only helped me focus on the real objective at hand but she provided ways to answer tricky and challenging questions as well as how to keep my nerves at bay. She also provided insight into things that were potentially holding me back. Ali is one of the most encouraging people I have met. Her life experiences, coupled with what I know to be a true desire to see me succeed is what makes her fantastic at her job. Thank you Ali for your guidance, encouragement and support." Testimonial Secondary school - Worthing " Ali provided a really informative session that allowed us to discuss the potential symptoms of the menopause without negativity or fearmongering. She was very open and shared her personal story which made it easier for the group to feel we could also talk openly about our own experiences and concerns. Together, we discussed what we would want to see in our organisation to create a culture of openness and honesty about the reproductive health of women. A really helpful and empowering meeting. " Privacy Policy Contact © 2025 Ocean Breeze Wellbeing & Consultancy. Home About me Menopause Consultancy Menopause workshop and presentation Testimonials Blog Contact Lets talk! We are using cookies to give you the best experience on our website. You can find out more about which cookies we are using or switch them off in settings . Accept Close GDPR Cookie Settings Privacy Overview Strictly Necessary Cookies Powered by GDPR Cookie Compliance Privacy Overview This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful. Strictly Necessary Cookies Strictly Necessary Cookie should be enabled at all times so that we can save your preferences for cookie settings.
